Package net.sourceforge.taglets.simple Description

Simple Taglets interfaces.

This package contains the base interfaces used to describe a Simple Taglet.

All taglets provided by the Taglets Collection are SimpleTaglets, the core engine guarantees that they can be used independently of the actual JavaDoc version used.

There are two types of SimpleTaglets:

BlockTaglets

Taglets used for all JavaDoc tags that appear alone on a JavaDoc comment line, examples include @param, @return and @see.

InlineTaglets

Taglets used inside JavaDoc comments, examples include {@link ...}.

A Simple Taglet is either a block or an inline taglet. Currently due to restriction in the way taglets are handled by JavaDoc it is not possible to define a taglet that handles both block comments as well as inline comments.

Refer to package net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.inline or net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.block to see some default implementations of Simple Taglets.
